name: EVIL-ISH
description:
A group project by Team Squidish created for the GMTK 2021 GameJam.

Evil-ish is a game about a necromancer hell-bent on destroying the world. Everything he needs to begin the apocalypse is already inside his homely old dungeon - the only problem? Heroes and peasants from the local village keep breaking in and attacking him!

To protect yourself, you must place towers in the field outside your dungeon and quickly find all the ingredients needed to begin the end of the world. 

But that's not all - because Evil-ish combines Tower Defence with Dungeon Crawling, when an enemy gets past your towers it's not game over - they'll appear inside your dungeon you'll need to take them on yourself!

Defeating enemies yourself may also reward you with cards used to upgrade your towers outside - or even add new ones!

We hope you enjoy our game that combines tower defence and dungeon crawling!
